title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Keith Hernandez and The Miz
itunes:title: 04/09/21 DPS Hour 3 Keith Hernandez and The Miz
description:
Keith Hernandez tells Dan that the pitch in last night's game was a strike and the player leaned into it. It should not have been ruled hit-by-pitch. The Miz says that his career would not have happened if he never got on the Real World and he is looking forward to live fans at WresleMania 37.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
